lead_paragraph: Tennessee Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota will have surgery Wednesday for his broken right leg, and coach Mike Mularkey says the recovery process will take four to five months.

headline.print_headline: Titans QB Mariota Will Have Leg Surgery on Wednesday
headline.main: Titans QB Mariota Will Have Leg Surgery on Wednesday

snippet: Tennessee Titans quarterback Marcus Mariota will have surgery Wednesday for his broken right leg, and coach Mike Mularkey says the recovery process will take four to five months....
